launch_text: AirAsia dominates the Asian skies with a fleet of some of the most advanced instruments and a super powerful management. It has been named as the world's best low-cost airline and a pioneer of low-cost travel in Asia. AirAsia group operates domestic and international flights to 100 destinations in 22 countries. Its main hub is the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA). Discover AirAsia with this hall.
splash_instruction:
Instructions to use this Experizer experience:

1. VR Goggles: Look around. Use the center screen dot to focus on yellow plates on the floor to navigate.

2. Mobile: Look around or use thumb to move camera.Use the view finder to focus on yellow plates on the floor to navigate.

3.Desktop: Use key board to navigate and drag mouse to look around?
